name: Plan F - Organic Vegan Mass Gainer

Breakfast.details: Organic Tofu Scramble: 14 oz organic firm tofu, 1/4 cup organic nutritional yeast, 1/2 cup organic mixed vegetables (spinach, mushrooms, bell peppers), 2 slices organic whole grain bread, 1 organic avocado, 2 tbsp organic olive oil
Breakfast.instructions: Crumble and cook tofu with nutritional yeast and vegetables. Serve with whole grain toast and mashed avocado.

Mid-Morning Snack.details: Organic Protein-Packed Smoothie: 2 scoops organic vegan protein powder, 1 cup organic soy milk, 1 organic banana, 2 tbsp organic almond butter, 1/4 cup organic rolled oats, 1 tbsp organic ground flaxseed

Lunch.details: Organic Lentil and Quinoa Power Bowl: 1 cup cooked organic lentils, 1/2 cup cooked organic quinoa, 1 cup organic roasted vegetables (sweet potato, Brussels sprouts), 1/4 cup organic hummus, 2 tbsp organic tahini dressing
Lunch.instructions: Combine lentils, quinoa, and roasted vegetables. Top with hummus and drizzle with tahini dressing.

Pre-Workout Snack.details: Organic Energy Balls: 1/2 cup organic dates, 1/4 cup organic almonds, 1/4 cup organic walnuts, 2 tbsp organic chia seeds, 2 tbsp organic cocoa powder
Pre-Workout Snack.instructions: Process ingredients in a food processor, roll into balls.

Post-Workout Snack.details: Organic Vegan Protein Shake: 2 scoops organic vegan protein powder, 1 cup organic almond milk, 1/2 organic banana, 1 tbsp organic peanut butter, 1 cup organic spinach

Dinner.details: Organic Tempeh Stir-Fry: 8 oz organic tempeh, 2 cups organic mixed vegetables (broccoli, carrots, snap peas), 1 cup cooked organic brown rice, 2 tbsp organic tamari sauce, 1 tbsp organic sesame oil
Dinner.instructions: Stir-fry tempeh and vegetables, season with tamari. Serve over brown rice.

Evening Snack.details: Organic Chia Seed Pudding: 1/4 cup organic chia seeds, 1 cup organic coconut milk, 1 tbsp organic maple syrup, 1/4 cup organic mixed nuts, 1/4 cup organic berries
Evening Snack.instructions: Mix chia seeds, coconut milk, and maple syrup. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours. Top with nuts and berries before serving.
